nodes.body: {!header} Con season is upon us, and we want the public to see your game! If you have a demo that you would like STLGameDev to feature at our next booth, please send SeiferTim a message on Discord!

events.title: GameDev Social!
events.description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. Our monthly hangout is open to EVERYONE. This is an all ages event, but minors must be accompanied by a parent or guardian. Alcoholic drinks are 100% optional. Dirty 20 has plenty of non-alcoholic drink options, yummy mac n' cheeses, and other munchies if you get hungry.

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307236092
events.location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

events.title: Dev Day Out @ Paint Louis!
events.description:
Join us as we admire the world's largest graffiti festival! WE WILL *NOT* BE PAINTING, just looking at masterpieces created in 48 hours. In true game developer fashion, you will be asked to think critically about the pieces and how you might incorporate styles like this into your games.

This event is over a mile of walking outside with no shade! Wear good shoes, sunglasses, and stay hydrated!

Parking might be chaos. Ride with a buddy if you can.

  • 1:00-1:15: Group up in front of the Mill Creek Pumping Station
  • 1:15-2:30: Walk and talk about the art!
  • 2:30-3:00: Brainstorming exercise in the shade

To RSVP, go to:¬†https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/310235870
events.location: 1000 S Wharf St, St. Louis, MO 63104, USA
